subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Robert Karlsson of Sweden overcame a double-bogey start with a round of 2-under-par 68 to tie Jeev Milkha Singh for the early clubhouse lead in the first round.
snippet: Robert Karlsson of Sweden overcame a double-bogey start with a round of 2-under-par 68 to tie Jeev Milkha Singh for the early clubhouse lead in the first round.
